param.name: header_login
param.label: Login Page Title
param.description: Text to display at the top of the page. If left blank, the Menu name will be used instead

param.name: login
param.label: Login Redirection URL
param.description: What page will the login redirect to after login, if let blank will load front page

param.name: login_message
param.label: Login JS Message
param.description: Show/Hide the javascript Pop-up indicating Login Success

param.name: description_login_text
param.label: Login Description Text
param.description: Text to display on the login Page, if left blank _LOGIN_DESCRIPTION will be used

param.name: header_logout
param.label: Logout Page Title
param.description: Text to display at the top of the page. If left blank, the Menu name will be used instead

param.name: logout
param.label: Logout Redirection URL
param.description: What page will be redirected to after logout, if let blank will load front page

param.name: logout_message
param.label: Logout JS Message
param.description: Show/Hide the javascript Pop-up indicating Logout Success

param.name: description_logout_text
param.label: Logout Description Text
param.description: Text to display on the logout Page, if left blank _LOGOUT_DESCRIPTION will be used
